summary:
Or, all the futuristic stuff I've always dreamed of owning. 
And who hasn't dreamed of owning items we see in a movie, or on TV.  I remember my friend Linda and I desperately wanting to join the USS Enterprise so we could each have a phaser, not realising till much later on, that this meant we might end up being an Infamous Red Shirt ‚Äî usually the first characters to get shot at or die a grisly death in nearly every episode of Trek...
title: SF Gizmos & Gadgets

summary:
Abandoned shoes 
I had an idea to post a #phriday post on Fridays: a photo and my reflections on it.  Then I realized it doesn't have to be limited to just me. 
Everyone will have their own associations about the picture with the abandoned shoes...
title: Phriday: Let's Photo Reflect Together
